title: Creating your first .NET/C# program
description: In this article, we are creating a small console application using the .NET CLI to get started with .NET 5+ and C#.

title: Introduction to C# variables
description: In this article, we explore variables. What they are, how to create them, and how to use them. Variables are essential elements of a program, making it dynamic.

title: Introduction to C# constants
description: In this article, we explore constants. A constant is a special kind of variable.

title: Introduction to C# comments
description: In this article, we explore single-line and multiline comments.

title: Introduction to user inputs
description: In this article, we explore how to retrieve simple user inputs from the console. This will help us make our programs more dynamic by interacting with the user.

title: Introduction to string concatenation
description: In this article, we dig deeper into strings and explore string concatenation.

title: Introduction to string interpolation
description: In this article, we explore string interpolation as another way to compose a string.

title: Escaping characters in C# strings
description: In this article, we explore how to escape characters like quotes and how to write special character like tabs and new lines.

title: Introduction to boolean algebra
description: This article introduces the mathematical branch of algebra that evaluates the value of a condition to true or false.

title: Writing conditional code blocks with if-else selection statements
description: In this article, we explore how to write conditional code using boolean algebra.

title: Introduction to logical operators
description: In this article, we explore how to leverage logical operators to write complex boolean condition.

title: Introduction to numbers and arithmetic operators
description: In this article, we explore numbers and arithmetic operators.

title: Converting (parsing) strings to numbers.
description: In this article, we explore numbers and arithmetic operators.

title: Introduction to types
description: In this article, we explore types...
